title: thanks heaps, riot.
body: thanks for once again, punishing your players for your own mistakes. taking away my lp for a remake game that i couldnt connect to because of a bug in your client. of course the warning comes up when i lose 14 lp and return back to the homepage. 'We are aware of some players experiencing crashes during game start. Please visit the service status page for a workaround while we are working on a permanent fix.' No one will probably see this since the riot team is so busy 'fixing' the client, but ill just have my hopes up anyways.
